name: Pixel Land ( Working Progress )
description:
Pixel Land - Procedural Game

PT:  Um jogo voxel 2D de exploração em geração procedural, Sendo desenvolvido por mim solo no Construct 2 ( engine/framework ) de programação visual.
EN:  2D voxel game of exploration in procedural generation, Being developed by me solo in Construct 2 (engine / framework) of visual programming.

Controls: 

- Camera: ⬆⬇⬅➞
- Quality pixels: Number 1 or 2 top keyboard.
- Reload Map: R
